title: What's happening with Trident?
description: Later this year, there will be a debate and vote in Parliament on whether to order four new Vanguard submarines for Britain's nuclear weapons system to replace the existing fleet. Reporter Giles Dilnot looked at the future of Trident in a film for Daily Politics.
tags: daily politics reporter giles dilnot looked at the future of britain's nuclear weapons system,with a parliamentary vote on whether to replace the existing fleet of submarines due in 2016.
